casebody.data:
In the Matter of J.E. & B.E. No. 231A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. Tyrone Wade, Charlotte, for Mecklenburg County DSS. Scott S. Addison, Charlotte, for Guardian ad Litem.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 643 S.E.2d 70.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of September 2007 by Respondent (Mother) to Withdraw Appeal as Moot:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2007."
